title: Abstraction
creator_credit: American Federation of Arts, ACI Films and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Shows that abstraction is an essential aspect of daily living. Uses a variety of examples to establish a definition of abstraction and to illustrate how the artist employs it when selecting what is visually and emotionally significant in the creation of their work.
